scripts.start: npx tsc && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx serverless offline start --stage dev
scripts.start:local: npx tsc && (npx sequelize db:drop || echo 'skip drop db') && npx sequelize db:create && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all && npx serverless offline start --stage dev
scripts.db:all: npx tsc && npx sequelize db:create && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.test:ci: tslint src/**/*.ts && npx tsc && npx sequelize db:create && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all && nyc cucumber-js ./tests/features --require ./tests --format ./node_modules/cucumber-pretty --exit
